items.titolo: OpenAI cofounder's journal seemingly outlines plot with Altman to oust Musk to establish a for-profit biz — ‘This is the only chance we have to get out from Elon,’ Brockman wrote
items.descrizione: OpenAI co-founder Greg Brockman's personal notes reveal that they've been discussing turning the AI firm into a non-profit without Elon Musk.

items.titolo: Google rivede i limiti di Gemini e separa le quote per Thinking e Pro
OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google all have new AI healthcare tools - here's how they work
items.descrizione: Concerns about data privacy and hallucination aren't slowing the healthcare industry's embrace of automation.
